attributes.action: Prevent Nick Griffin of the BNP from attending the Queens Garden Party
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is not the arena for the BNP to make into a political stunt. If the Queen wanted him to be there he would have got an invite. The way guests can be invited should be changed in future to stop this happening again.

rejection.details: As a Government website we cannot publish party political material, such as references to political parties. Nick Griffin has declined his invitation to the palace.
